screen_desc: The screenshot shows an Amazon shopping cart page with an Acer Predator Helios 300 Gaming Laptop in the cart, priced at $1,205.00. The subtotal is $1,205.00, and users can proceed to checkout by clicking the yellow button. There is an option to send the item as a gift with a custom message.
action_think: The user has already added the Acer Predator Helios 300 Gaming Laptop to the cart and clicked on the 'Proceed to checkout' button. The next step is to complete the checkout process by either filling in the required information or selecting an existing address.
action_plan: Fill in the required checkout information
Select an existing address if available
Confirm the order & proceed to payment
action_desc: Back to the Amazon cart page, click on the 'Continue shopping' button if not ready to checkout, otherwise, click on the 'Proceed to checkout' button.
action_result: By clicking on the "Proceed to checkout" button, you have successfully navigated to the checkout page. This action has progressed towards the user request, as you are now ready to complete the purchase and enter your payment information.
prev_action_result: By pressing the back button, we have moved from the checkout page to the cart page. This action is necessary to select the Acer Predator Helios 300 Gaming Laptop from the cart before proceeding to checkout.
